attributes.action: Halal meat banning in the UK,
attributes.additional_details: After it has broke out in the world wide media it has made me and people sickened that such cruelty can take place, we need to put a stop to such abuse, we are meant to be protecting animals because like humans they have rights, the government must take action by banning such cruelty to go on in the country that we call "home" if you care about this as much as I do and I know others do please take a few minutes to sign this      E-petition every single signature helps a bit further to helping stop such cruelty thank you.
